body.name: Dell Optiplex 7010 SFF Desktop PC - Intel Core i5-3470 3.2GHz 4GB 250GB DVD Windows 10 Pro (Renewed)
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: POWERFUL PROCESSOR - Configured with top of the line series processor for lightning fast, reliable and consistent performance to ensure an exceptional PC experience.
SUPERIOR STORAGE AND MEMORY – Customized with 250GB storage space to store apps, games, photos, music and movies. Loaded with DELLGB of RAM to zip through multiple tasks in a hurry without lag.

BUILT IN CONNECTIVITY - Stay connected to the internet with USB WIFI Adaptor. Play your favorite music files with stereo sound. Easily connect to large and multiple monitors through the installed onboard video connections.

WINDOWS 10 LATEST RELEASE - A new installation of the latest Microsoft Windows 10 Professional 64 Bit Operating System software, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft's latest and best OS to date, Windows 10 Professional 64 Bit will maximize the utility of each PC for years to come. Optional software such as Anti-Virus and Office 365 can also be easily downloaded through the Microsoft Windows App Store.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE - All Amazon Renewed computers come with a 90-day warranty and technical support to provide customers with unmatched quality and care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Operation is good
reviews.reviewText: Family computer exactly as described very fast, improved video on my monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect value for CNC machine
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to run my CNC machine, it is far beyond expectations and keeps them running night and day with no problems.A great value for the purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars PC NOT WORKING
reviews.reviewText: The information from Amazon said to buy with confidence, but I am not sure about that, when the product arrived the side panel was bent and difficult to open in addition to this the system would not boot up, and an orange light blinked continuously. I will visit the computer technician in the morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not exactly as I understood. No DVD or wifi adapter or even power cord. Easy set up, clean and looks new. Set up with twin monitors and love the extra usb ports.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best value for your dollar. Absolutely top notch and works better than new.
reviews.reviewText: Unboxed and with just a couple of clicks on the mouse and my system was up and running. All programs were installed like windows 10. Fast quiet and very sharp for a refurbished item. 10 out 10 and would defiantly buy another for my bike shop. If you want a reliable and cheap but not cheaply made item, buy from Blair Technology.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The noisiest CPU I ever owned!!!
reviews.reviewText: The plastic mesh front hums and rattles!! Very annoying... can be heard across the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how customer service from United PC TEK is because I didn't have to call or email them. The PC came as described in a very well packaged box, including a USB WiFi dongle, keyboard, and mouse. Both the inside and outside of the PC were immaculate. I don't know if the hard drive worked as I replaced it with a new SSD. I also added a PCIe network card. USB ports, NIC port, display ports, vga, power supply all work normally. Runs great so far. The PC was in perfect condition except for a few exterior scratches, otherwise I can't complain and would buy again. Not sure if the Windows Key worked either, as I am running Linux on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great computer at the right price
reviews.reviewText: Added another 4K of ram, a GForce-710 graphics card, and a 1TB SSD. Works like a champ, no problem whatsoever. Excellent computer at the renewal price. Renewal item looked like new and only evidence that it was not is the OEM version of Windows 10. Although advertised as Win10 Pro it was delivered as Win 10 Home but that is not a problem for me. Certainly recommend, especially if from the same vendor I used.

reviews.reviewTitle: it's a windows 10 pro machine w a 500GB HDD
reviews.reviewText: Arrived promptly; everything was up to spec. Promptly removed the HDD, put in a 128GB SSD and installed TrueNAS in it, and added 4GB of memory. The network adapter of this Dell uses a superior intel chipset, compared with realtek for most everyone else.
